Title: The February Seventh Movement
Publisher: Shanghai jiaoyu chubanshe (上海教育出版社)
Notes: The large strike on the Beijing-Hankou railway was brutally suppressed on February 7, 1923.The location shown could be the headquarters of the Beijing-Hankou Railway Federation of Trade Unions in Wuhan, now a memorial hall (https://zh.m.wikipedia.org/zh-hk/京汉铁路总工会旧址).Educational poster for use in schools.
